actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

official_title: Prohibiting any personal staff employee of a Member of the House of Representatives from holding a paid position in the campaign of the employing Member.

summary.text: Prohibits a personal staff employee of a Member of the House of Representatives from being employed by such Member's political committee or otherwise performing services for pay from the Member's campaign funds while on the House payroll.

titles.title: Prohibiting any personal staff employee of a Member of the House of Representatives from holding a paid position in the campaign of the employing Member.
